snippet: Texas legislators who saw the video of Ms. Bland’s July 10 traffic stop condemned the actions of the officer during her arrest.
abstract: Texas lawmakers condemn behavior of Brian T Encinia, state trooper who arrested Sandra Bland after routine traffic stop, upon release of dashboard camera video documenting encounter; Bland was found dead of apparent suicide three days later in her jail cell; video depicts heated confrontation, contradicting Encinia's description; Bland's family has questioned ruling of death as suicide.

byline.contributor: Ashley Southall contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Texas legislators who saw the video of Ms. Bland’s July 10 traffic stop condemned the actions of the officer during her arrest.

headline.main: Sandra Bland Was Threatened With Taser, Police Video Shows
headline.print_headline: Video of Arrest Fuels Anger Over Woman’s Death in Jail
